CONSOLE ERROR: Refused to execute script from 'http://127.0.0.1:8000/security/contentTypeOptions/resources/script-with-header.pl?mime=video/x-motion-jpeg&options=invalid' because its MIME type ('video/x-motion-jpeg') is not executable.
CONSOLE ERROR: Refused to execute script from 'http://127.0.0.1:8000/security/contentTypeOptions/resources/script-with-header.pl?mime=video/whatever+xml&options=invalid' because its MIME type ('video/whatever xml') is not executable.
This is a testharness.js-based test.
PASS All video/* scripts should be blocked. 
Harness: the test ran to completion.
